overview.title: Overview
overview.body: The Affiliate Program rewards affiliates based on the wager turnover from referred players in Slots , Live Casino , Sportsbooks and Lottery. Commissions are calculated every 24 hours, with earnings based on different turnover tiers.

calculation.title: How Commissions Are Calculated
calculation.desc:
Commissions are calculated every 24 hours based on referred players' total wagers. 
Examples:

points.0: Commissions are available for withdrawal once calculated.
points.1: There is no expiration for unclaimed commissions‚Äîthey accumulate until claimed.
points.2: Withdrawals follow the platform's standard rules, such as minimum limits and processing times.

system.title: System Time and Operations
system.claimDailyValue: Available daily at 14:00 UTC (Your Local Time: {local}).
system.note: Note: While we work with providers from different time zones, all calculations follow UTC to ensure consistency and avoid confusion.

about.title: About {siteName}
about.subtitle: A global online gaming platform connecting players to high-quality casino and betting games

features.title: 5,000+ Premium Games
features.description: Access to slots, poker, sports betting, and live casino games from top providers

features.title: Instant Transactions
features.description: Lightning-fast deposits and withdrawals with secure blockchain technology

features.title: Verified Fair Play
features.description: All games are RNG-certified and tested for fairness and transparency

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Dedicated customer support team available round the clock

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: {siteName} is a global online gaming platform that connects players to thousands of high-quality casino and betting games. We work with the industry's most respected providers to deliver a seamless experience on every device.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: Every feature, every spin, and every card dealt is designed to bring you closer to the thrill of real gaming while keeping everything transparent and fair.

items.title: Mission
items.content: To make online gaming simple, safe, and rewarding for everyone. We believe gaming should feel personal ‚Äî not mechanical.

items.title: Vision
items.content: To set a new standard for online gaming platforms built on trust, innovation, and real value for players.

items.title: Values
items.content: Player-first approach, transparent operations, responsible gaming, and continuous innovation.

responsibleGaming.title: Fair & Responsible Gaming
responsibleGaming.description: We believe that gaming should always be responsible and transparent. That's why {siteName} follows strict international gaming standards and age policies.

points.title: 18+ Only
points.description: Only players aged 18 or older can register and play

points.title: Secure & Fair
points.description: All games tested for fairness with encryption

ourPromise.title: Our Promise
ourPromise.paragraph1: We're not here to be another casino site ‚Äî we're here to set a new standard for online gaming. When you play on {siteName}, you play on a platform built on trust, innovation, and real value.
ourPromise.paragraph2: Every update, every feature, and every partnership we add is focused on one goal: giving players the best gaming experience possible.

description.title: About {siteName} - Your Premier Online Gaming Destination

intro.heading: Welcome to {siteName}
intro.paragraph1: is a leading global online casino and betting platform that has revolutionized the way players experience online gaming. Launched with a vision to create the most comprehensive, secure, and entertaining gaming platform, {siteName} has quickly become the go-to destination for players seeking premium casino games, live dealer experiences, sports betting, and much more.
intro.paragraph2: Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with an extensive game library, partnering with the world's most trusted gaming providers to deliver an unparalleled entertainment experience. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to online gaming, {siteName} offers something for everyone.
intro.paragraph3: At {siteName}, we believe that online gaming should be more than just placing bets‚Äîit should be an immersive, secure, and rewarding experience that puts players first. This philosophy drives everything we do, from our game selection to our customer support.

games.heading: Massive Game Collection - Over 5,000 Premium Titles
games.paragraph2: from the industry's leading software providers. Our extensive collection ensures that every type of player finds their perfect game, whether you prefer classic slots, modern video slots, table games, live casino, or sports betting.

slots.title: Slots & Video Slots:
slots.description: From classic 3-reel slots to feature-packed 5-reel video slots with stunning graphics, bonus rounds, and progressive jackpots. Enjoy popular titles from providers like Pragmatic Play, NetEnt, Play'n GO, and Microgaming.

liveCasino.title: Live Casino Games:
liveCasino.description: Experience the thrill of real casino action with our live dealer games powered by Evolution Gaming. Play live blackjack, roulette, baccarat, and game shows with professional dealers in real-time HD streaming.

sports.title: Sports Betting:
sports.description: Comprehensive sportsbook covering major sports leagues worldwide including football, basketball, tennis, cricket, and esports. Enjoy competitive odds, live betting, and in-play markets.

poker.title: Poker & Table Games:
poker.description: Multiple poker variants including Texas Hold'em, Caribbean Stud, and video poker. Plus classic table games like blackjack, roulette, and baccarat with various rule sets and betting limits.

technology.heading: Next-Generation Blockchain Technology
technology.paragraph1: What sets {siteName} apart is our implementation of
technology.paragraph2: that ensures complete transparency, security, and fairness in every transaction and game outcome. Our blockchain-powered platform provides instant verification of game results, making it impossible for anyone‚Äîincluding us‚Äîto manipulate outcomes.
technology.paragraph3: This technology enables lightning-fast cryptocurrency deposits and withdrawals, often completed in minutes rather than days. Players can deposit and withdraw using various cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, and more, with minimal fees and maximum security.
technology.paragraph4: Our infrastructure is built on redundant servers across multiple locations, ensuring
technology.paragraph5: and uninterrupted gaming experience. Even during peak traffic or maintenance, our load-balancing systems ensure smooth gameplay without lag or downtime.

security.heading: Security & Fair Play - Certified and Verified
security.paragraph1: Player security and fair play are non-negotiable at {siteName}. All our games undergo rigorous testing and are certified by independent testing agencies. Every slot, table game, and random outcome is powered by
security.paragraph2: ensuring completely fair and unpredictable results.
security.paragraph3: We employ military-grade SSL encryption to protect all data transmissions between your device and our servers. Your personal information, financial details, and gaming activity are encrypted and stored securely, meeting international data protection standards including GDPR compliance.
security.paragraph4: Our platform undergoes regular security audits by third-party cybersecurity firms to identify and address any potential vulnerabilities. We also implement two-factor authentication (2FA) for all user accounts, adding an extra layer of protection against unauthorized access.

global.heading: Global Reach - Serving Players Worldwide
global.paragraph1: {siteName} is proud to serve a diverse community of
global.paragraph3: around the world. Our platform supports multiple languages and currencies, making it accessible and convenient for players regardless of their location.
global.paragraph4: We understand that gaming preferences vary by region, which is why we've curated our game selection to include titles popular in different markets. From Asian-themed slots to Western classics, sports betting on local leagues, and regionally preferred payment methods, we cater to global tastes while maintaining local relevance.

payments.heading: Flexible Payment Methods
payments.paragraph1: {siteName} supports a wide range of payment methods to ensure convenient deposits and withdrawals for players worldwide. We accept major cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, USDT, and more), traditional payment methods, and various e-wallets.
payments.paragraph3: , eliminating the long waiting periods associated with traditional banking methods. Most cryptocurrency withdrawals are processed within minutes, while other payment methods are completed within 24 hours.

mobile.heading: Mobile-Optimized Gaming Experience
mobile.paragraph1: In today's mobile-first world, {siteName} delivers a fully optimized mobile gaming experience. Our platform is built with responsive design technology, ensuring seamless gameplay on any device‚Äîwhether you're using a smartphone, tablet, or desktop computer.
mobile.paragraph2: No app download is required. Simply access {siteName} through your mobile browser and enjoy the full range of games, betting options, and account features. The mobile interface is intuitive, fast-loading, and designed for touch navigation, making it easy to browse games, place bets, manage your account, and contact support on the go.

support.heading: 24/7 Customer Support
support.paragraph1: Our dedicated customer support team is available
support.availability: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
support.paragraph2: to assist you with any questions or issues. Whether you need help with deposits, game rules, account verification, or technical issues, our multilingual support staff is ready to help via live chat, email, or support ticket system.
support.paragraph3: We pride ourselves on fast response times and effective problem resolution. Most live chat inquiries are answered within minutes, and we strive to resolve all issues on first contact. Our comprehensive FAQ and help center also provide instant answers to common questions.

responsible.heading: Commitment to Responsible Gaming
responsible.paragraph1: {siteName} is committed to promoting responsible gaming practices. We provide various tools to help players maintain control over their gaming activities, including deposit limits, session time reminders, self-exclusion options, and reality check features.
responsible.paragraph2: We strictly enforce age verification procedures to ensure that only players aged 18 and above can access our platform. Our staff is trained to identify problem gaming behaviors and provide support resources, including links to professional organizations that offer gambling addiction counseling and treatment.

point1.title: Largest Game Selection:
point1.description: Over 5,000 games from 50+ premium providers including Pragmatic Play, Evolution Gaming, NetEnt, Microgaming, Play'n GO, Hacksaw Gaming, and more.

point2.title: Instant Transactions:
point2.description: Blockchain-powered deposits and withdrawals completed in minutes, not days. No more waiting for your winnings.

point3.title: Provably Fair Gaming:
point3.description: RNG-certified games with blockchain verification. Every game outcome can be independently verified for fairness.

point4.title: Industry-Best Security:
point4.description: Military-grade encryption, 2FA authentication, and regular security audits ensure your data and funds are always protected.

point5.title: Generous Bonuses & Promotions:
point5.description: Regular promotions, welcome bonuses, cashback offers, free spins, and a rewarding VIP program for loyal players.

point6.title: Superior User Experience:
point6.description: Intuitive interface, fast loading times, mobile optimization, and 24/7 multilingual customer support.

closing.paragraph1: Whether you're looking for the excitement of slots, the strategy of poker, the thrill of live dealers, or the action of sports betting, {siteName} provides a premium gaming experience that combines entertainment, security, and real value. Join thousands of players who have already discovered why {siteName} is the future of online gaming.
closing.tagline: {siteName}: Where Real Gaming Meets Real Trust

seoContent.title: {siteName}
seoContent.paragraph1: Online gaming has exploded in popularity, offering an exhilarating experience like never before! As we step into 2025, the gaming world is brimming with endless possibilities, featuring thousands of games that cater to every taste and style.
seoContent.paragraph2: Whether you're a fan of thrilling slots, strategic card games, or immersive live dealer experiences, there's something here for everyone. Our platform is all about delivering fresh, innovative, and exciting content that keeps players on the edge of their seats.
seoContent.paragraph3: We make it easy and secure to jump in and play with a variety of payment options. Get ready to dive into a world of adventure and big wins, where the fun never stops and the rewards are endless. Join us and be part of a gaming revolution that promises non-stop excitement!

disclaimer.line2: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and only bet what you can afford to lose.
disclaimer.line3: If you feel you have a gambling problem, please seek help.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How {siteName}.games collects, uses, and protects your data

intro.paragraph1: {siteName} ('{siteName}.games', 'we', 'us', or 'our') runs the {siteName} crypto-casino platform. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect personal and transaction data when you use our website, mobile apps, or related services (the 'Services').
intro.paragraph2: {siteName} operates as a crypto-wallet-only casino: all deposits and withdrawals are made using cryptocurrency wallets. We are committed to protecting your privacy while meeting regulatory obligations (such as AML/KYC requirements) and ensuring a safe, fair gaming environment.
intro.paragraph3: By accessing or using {siteName}.games you accept the terms of this Privacy Policy.

scope.title: 1. Scope & Acceptance
scope.content: This policy applies to all users of {siteName}.games. We may update this policy; updates take effect when posted on the site. Continued use following a change means you accept the new policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. What Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: Because we operate with crypto wallets only, the types of data we collect reflect that model. We collect:

accountData.title: A. Account & Identity Data (when required)
accountData.email: Email (if provided), display name, account ID.
accountData.kyc: Important: While crypto wallets enable on-chain anonymity, certain transactions or regulatory triggers may require identity verification. We will clearly request KYC only when necessary.

walletData.title: B. Wallet & Transaction Data
walletData.addresses: Cryptocurrency wallet addresses you connect or use with {siteName}.
walletData.metadata: Transaction metadata necessary to reconcile payments and prevent fraud.

technicalData.title: C. Technical & Usage Data
technicalData.ip: IP address, approximate geolocation derived from IP, device type, browser, OS.
technicalData.session: Session logs, time stamps, pages visited, game activity, wagers and outcomes.
technicalData.cookies: Cookies and analytics data to improve site performance and user experience.

securityData.title: D. Security & Risk Data
securityData.fraud: Fraud signals, device fingerprints, risk scores from anti-fraud vendors.
securityData.disputes: Records of dispute resolution, chargebacks (if applicable), and compliance checks.
securityData.note: We do not collect sensitive categories (race, religion, health, etc.) unless lawfully required and with clear consent.

purposes.title: 3. Why We Collect Data ‚Äì Lawful Bases & Purposes
purposes.intro: We process your data for lawful and specific purposes:

0.title: Service provision & contract performance
0.description: to create and maintain accounts, process deposits/withdrawals via crypto wallets, pay winnings.

1.title: Security & fraud prevention
1.description: detect and prevent abuse and money-laundering.

3.title: Marketing (with consent)
3.description: newsletters, promotional offers ‚Äî only if you opt in.

4.title: Legitimate interest
4.description: preserving platform integrity and investigating misuse.

purposes.outro: When we rely on consent (e.g., marketing), you can withdraw that consent anytime.

points.0: Wallet addresses and on-chain transaction data are stored only to the extent necessary to credit/debit user accounts, audit transactions, and meet compliance obligations.
points.1: On-chain data is public by nature ‚Äî {siteName} does not control blockchain visibility. We combine on-chain data with off-chain records to reconcile accounts.
points.2: If you connect a custodial wallet service (third-party), you consent to any data those providers share with us for transaction processing.

dataSharing.title: 5. When We Share Data

items.0: With regulators or law enforcement when compelled by legal process or to prevent illegal activity.
items.1: With affiliates or third parties in a business transfer (merger, acquisition) ‚Äî always with appropriate safeguards.
items.2: With fraud prevention networks to protect our platform and users.

dataSharing.noSelling: We do not sell your personal data to advertisers.

security.title: 6. Security Measures

items.0: TLS/SSL encryption in transit; encrypted storage for sensitive data.
items.1: Access controls, logging, and role-based privileges.
items.2: Regular security audits and vulnerability testing.
items.3: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) for staff and optional for users.

security.warning: You must keep your wallet private keys and account credentials secure. We never request private keys.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies & Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies for necessary site functions, analytics, and (with consent) marketing. You can control cookies in your browser, but disabling essential cookies may break functionality.

minAge.title: 8. Children & Minimum Age
minAge.content: You must be 18+ (or older if required by local law) to use our Services. We actively prevent underage use and will delete data if a minor's registration is identified.

breach.title: 9. Breach Notification
breach.content: In case of a data breach that presents a risk to your rights, we will notify affected users and relevant authorities as required by law, and we will take steps to remediate.

changes.title: 10. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may modify this Privacy Policy. Material changes will be posted on the site and, when appropriate, notified to you.

intro.paragraph1: By registering or connecting your wallet on www.hyperbetz.games, you enter into a binding agreement with HyperBetz N.V.
intro.paragraph2: If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not access, use, or register on our Website. Read these Terms carefully. If you are uncertain about your rights or obligations, consult a legal advisor in your jurisdiction before using the Website.

ownership.title: 1. HyperBetz.games Ownership
ownership.content1: HyperBetz.games is owned and operated by HyperBetz N.V. ('HyperBetz', 'We', 'Our', 'Us').
ownership.content2: HyperBetz.games is a crypto-wallet-only casino. All deposits, wagers, and withdrawals are processed through users' cryptocurrency wallets. We support wallet login through Dynamic.xyz and compatible wallet connectors (e.g., WalletConnect / MetaMask).

notice.title: 2. Important Notice
notice.content1: 2.1 By registering or connecting your wallet on www.hyperbetz.games (the 'Website'), you enter into a binding agreement with HyperBetz N.V. and agree to: (i) these Terms and Conditions; (ii) our Privacy Policy; (iii) our Cookie Policy; (iv) our Affiliate Terms; and (v) our Responsible Gaming Policy.
notice.content2: 2.2 If you do not agree with any of these terms, do not access, use, or register on our Website.
notice.content3: 2.3 Read these Terms carefully. If you are uncertain about your rights or obligations, consult a legal advisor in your jurisdiction before using the Website.

general.title: 3. General Terms
items: Upon registration or wallet connection, you ('User', 'Player', 'You', or 'Your') agree to comply with all HyperBetz rules and policies.
This Agreement is a legally binding contract between you and HyperBetz.games.
These Terms become effective the moment you connect your wallet and start using the site.
HyperBetz reserves the right to amend or update these Terms at any time. Changes will be published on the Website; continued use constitutes acceptance.
In the event of conflict, these Terms prevail over any other rules, promotions, or external materials.
Only the English version of these Terms is legally binding. Translations are for convenience only.

account.title: 4. Account, Wallet Login & Security
account.intro: HyperBetz uses Dynamic.xyz for wallet-based authentication and security measures to protect your account.

walletLogin.title: 4.1 Wallet Login (Dynamic.xyz)
items: HyperBetz uses Dynamic.xyz (or other supported connectors) for wallet-based login and authentication. By connecting a wallet, you confirm you are the lawful owner of that wallet and authorize HyperBetz to recognize that wallet as your account.
We never request your private keys. You must keep your wallet credentials and device secure. HyperBetz is not responsible for losses caused by compromised wallets or leaked private keys.

registration.title: 4.2 Registration Details
items: You may be asked to provide contact details (email, username) for account communication. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.
You are responsible for all actions taken using your connected wallet.

security.title: 4.3 Multiple Accounts & Security
items: Only one account per individual is permitted. Multiple accounts or attempts to circumvent limits may result in account suspension and fund forfeiture.
Enable any offered platform security features (for example, 2FA for associated services) and secure your own wallet.
Notify support immediately if you suspect unauthorized access.

eligibility.title: 5. Eligibility & User Warranties
items: You are at least 18 years old (or the minimum legal gambling age in your jurisdiction).
You are legally permitted to use online crypto gambling services where you are located.
You are the lawful owner of the wallet you connect.
You will not use VPNs or location spoofing to bypass regional restrictions.
You will not use the Service for illegal or commercial purposes.
You accept that cryptocurrency value may fluctuate and you bear all market risk.
eligibility.outro: 5.2 If you breach these warranties, HyperBetz may suspend or terminate access and withhold funds where permitted by law.

restricted.title: 6. Restricted Jurisdictions
restricted.content1: 6.1 HyperBetz does not accept players from jurisdictions where crypto gambling is prohibited or restricted. This includes, but is not limited to:
restricted.content2: United States (and U.S. territories), United Kingdom, France, Netherlands, Spain, Germany, Australia, Austria, Comoros, Iran, North Korea, Sudan, Syria, and any jurisdiction listed on FATF blacklists.
restricted.content3: 6.2 Attempting to access the Service from a restricted jurisdiction, including via VPN or proxy, is a breach of these Terms and may lead to account closure and forfeiture of funds.

policy.title: 7.1 Crypto-Only Policy
items: HyperBetz accepts deposits and withdrawals in supported cryptocurrencies only (e.g., BTC, ETH, USDT, TRX, BNB). No fiat, card, or bank-transfer deposits are accepted.
All deposits must originate from wallets you control. Deposits from third-party wallets are prohibited.

deposits.title: 7.2 Deposits
items: Deposits are credited after the required blockchain confirmations. Network (gas) fees are payable by you.
HyperBetz may refuse or reverse deposits that appear to originate from blocked addresses or restricted sources.

withdrawals.title: 7.3 Withdrawals
items: Withdrawals are processed to the wallet address you provide. HyperBetz may require you to confirm the destination wallet prior to processing.
You must have sufficient cleared balance to cover a withdrawal. Withdrawals may be delayed to investigate suspected abuse or unusual activity.

chargebacks.title: 7.4 Chargebacks & Reversals
items: Crypto transactions are final on-chain. If HyperBetz incurs losses because of chargebacks or reversals from third-party service providers (rare with on-chain), we reserve the right to recover amounts or charge administrative fees.

kyc.title: 8. No Routine Identity Verification (No KYC)
kyc.content1: 8.1 HyperBetz does not perform routine identity verification (KYC) as a condition of normal play. Users can connect a wallet via Dynamic.xyz and start playing without providing identity documents.
kyc.content2: 8.2 Notwithstanding the above, HyperBetz reserves the right to request information or suspend transactions if required to:
items: Comply with a lawful order from the competent authorities:
Prevent, investigate, or remediate fraud, money-laundering, or other illegal activity
Or protect the security and integrity of the platform.
kyc.content3: 8.3 If you refuse to provide such information when legally required, HyperBetz may restrict or close your account and delay or withhold withdrawals to the extent permitted by law.

fairPlay.title: 9. Fair Play, Prohibited Conduct & Security
items: Use bots, scripts, automated play tools, or any unauthorized software.
Collude with other players or manipulate game outcomes.
Create multiple accounts to exploit bonuses or promotions.
Attempt to reverse or tamper with on-chain transactions.
Exploit game bugs or platform vulnerabilities.
fairPlay.outro1: Accounts found cheating, colluding, or exploiting the platform may be suspended, closed, or have balances forfeited.
fairPlay.outro2: HyperBetz implements technical and behavioral monitoring to protect platform integrity.

bonuses.title: 10. Bonuses & Promotions
items: All bonus offers and promotions are subject to specific Bonus Terms stated with each offer.
Bonus abuse (including multiple accounts or rapid bonus switching) can lead to denial, reversal, or forfeiture of bonuses and closure of accounts.
Bonus wagering requirements must be met before withdrawing bonus-derived funds, as specified per promotion.

playingRules.title: 11. Playing Rules & Game Settlement
items: Bets are accepted only once you receive on-screen confirmation. Bets placed with insufficient balance are void.
HyperBetz's internal logs and blockchain records are authoritative in case of disputes.
If an event is canceled, suspended, or otherwise compromised, HyperBetz will settle or void bets according to published game and market rules.
For provably-fair games, verification tools and server seeds (where applicable) are made available per game; server logs are final.

errors.title: 12. Errors, Interruptions & Limits
errors.intro: HyperBetz is not liable for losses caused by:
items: Internet or device failures
Blockchain delays, forks, or network congestion
Software bugs or third-party service outages
errors.outro1: HyperBetz reserves the right to void bets, adjust balances, or cancel transactions when errors or exploits are detected.
errors.outro2: We may set wagering limits, maximum wins, and other controls to protect users and the platform.

suspension.title: 13. Suspension, Closure & Fund Handling
suspension.intro: HyperBetz may suspend or close accounts where:
items: Terms are violated
Abuse, fraud, or suspicious behavior is detected
Legal or regulatory obligations require it
suspension.outro1: On account closure, pending wagers may be canceled and remaining funds handled per applicable law and platform policy.
suspension.outro2: HyperBetz may retain funds where necessary to resolve disputes, comply with lawful requests, or remediate losses.

responsibleGaming.title: 14. Responsible Gaming
items: HyperBetz promotes responsible gambling. You may request: Self-exclusion, Deposit limits, or Temporary suspension.
If you suspect gambling harm, contact hyperbetz.games for immediate assistance.
Underage gambling (under 18 or the local legal age) is strictly prohibited. Accounts found to belong to minors will be closed and funds handled per policy.

ip.title: 15. Intellectual Property
ip.content1: All trademarks, logos, site content, software, and game assets on HyperBetz are owned or licensed by HyperBetz. Unauthorized copying, scraping, or redistribution is prohibited.
ip.content2: You are granted a limited, revocable license to access the Service for personal entertainment only.

liability.title: 16. Limitation of Liability
items: To the fullest extent permitted by law, HyperBetz will not be liable for indirect, special, consequential or incidental losses, including lost profits or opportunity costs.
Our aggregate liability for any claim related to these Terms shall not exceed the value of your last deposit or an amount specified by applicable law.
Nothing in these Terms limits liability for death or personal injury caused by negligence where applicable law prohibits such limitation.

disputes.title: 17. Dispute Resolution & Governing Law
disputes.content: In case of dispute, contact hyperbetz.games. We aim to resolve complaints quickly; escalate to management if needed.

amendments.title: 18. Amendments
amendments.content: HyperBetz may amend these Terms at any time. Updated Terms will be posted on the Website. Continued use constitutes acceptance.

miscellaneous.title: 19. Miscellaneous
items: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and HyperBetz regarding the Service.
If any clause is found unenforceable, it will be modified to the minimum extent necessary and the remaining provisions will remain in effect.
You may not assign your rights under these Terms. HyperBetz may assign or subcontract rights and obligations.

contact.title: 20. Contact
contact.intro: For support, complaints, or legal notices:

responsibleGambling.title: Responsible Gambling ‚Äì {siteName}.games
responsibleGambling.subtitle: Learn about responsible gambling at {siteName}.games. Stay in control, play responsibly, and get support through global help organizations.

intro.title: üéØ Responsible Gambling ‚Äì {siteName}.games
intro.paragraph1: At {siteName}.games, we are committed to ensuring that gaming remains a safe, enjoyable, and responsible form of entertainment.|We encourage our community to play smart, stay in control, and treat gambling as a leisure activity ‚Äî not as a source of income or financial recovery.
intro.paragraph2: We strictly prohibit all individuals under the age of 18 (or the minimum legal gambling age in their jurisdiction) from accessing or using our platform.

mission.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: {siteName} promotes responsible gaming by offering an environment that is transparent, secure, and community-driven.|Our mission is to help players make informed decisions and to prevent gambling from becoming a problem.

beliefs.0: Gambling as entertainment, not a way to earn money.
beliefs.2: Providing support tools and resources to prevent risky behavior.

understanding.title: üß† Understanding Responsible Gambling
understanding.paragraph1: Online gambling is more accessible than ever ‚Äî but that also means it's easier to lose track of time, balance, or motivation.|Responsible gambling means knowing your limits, staying informed, and maintaining control over your play.
understanding.paragraph2: To keep your experience fun and safe, remember:

tips.1: Don't chase losses ‚Äî take breaks when needed.
tips.2: Set personal limits for spending and time.
tips.3: Never gamble if you're stressed, tired, or upset.
tips.4: Avoid gambling with money intended for other expenses.
tips.5: If gambling stops being fun, it's time to step back.

selfCheck.title: üß© Self-Check: Are You Gambling Responsibly?

questions.0: Do you ever gamble longer than intended?
questions.1: Has gambling affected your relationships or work?
questions.2: Do you feel irritated when you can't play?
questions.3: Do you gamble to escape stress or boredom?
questions.4: Have you ever borrowed crypto or money to continue gambling?
questions.5: Do you often try to recover previous losses by betting more?

selfCheck.warning: If you answered "yes" to several of these, you may need to review your gambling habits and seek assistance.

tools.title: üõ°Ô∏è What {siteName} Offers to Help You Stay in Control
tools.intro: We want all players to enjoy gambling safely and responsibly.|Our platform includes several tools and resources designed to help you manage your gameplay.

selfExclusion.title: üîπ Self-Exclusion
selfExclusion.description: You can request a temporary or permanent self-exclusion from your account. During this period, your access will be restricted, and you won't receive promotional materials.|To initiate self-exclusion, contact {siteName}.games ‚Äî our team will assist you confidentially.

coolingOff.title: üîπ Cooling-Off Periods
coolingOff.paragraph1: Feeling overwhelmed or just need a break?|You can take a cooling-off period of:
coolingOff.paragraph2: During this time, your wallet connection will be disabled for gameplay.

depositAwareness.title: üîπ Deposit & Loss Awareness
depositAwareness.description: Since {siteName} operates exclusively via crypto wallets, players can easily monitor all deposits and transactions on-chain.|We encourage you to review your wallet activity regularly to stay aware of your total play volume.

underagePrevention.title: üë∂ Underage Gambling Prevention
underagePrevention.paragraph1: Gambling by anyone under 18 is strictly prohibited.|We take underage gambling seriously and actively discourage it.

tips.0: Use passwords or lock access on devices.
tips.1: Avoid storing wallet credentials or recovery phrases on shared devices.
tips.2: Log out of {siteName} when leaving your device unattended.
tips.3: Use content filters like NetNanny or GamBlock to restrict access.

underagePrevention.warning: If underage gambling is detected, the account will be immediately closed and any winnings forfeited.

helpSupport.title: ‚ù§Ô∏è Help and Support
helpSupport.intro: If you ever feel gambling is affecting your mental, emotional, or financial health, you are not alone.|Below are trusted global organizations that provide free and confidential help:
helpSupport.paragraph2: These resources offer self-assessment tools, online chat, and local support groups worldwide.

principles.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Responsible Gaming Principles at {siteName}
principles.intro: At {siteName}.games, we uphold these core principles:

0.title: Transparency:
0.description: Every game and outcome is provably fair and blockchain-verified.

1.title: Security:
1.description: All sessions are protected through Dynamic.xyz wallet login ‚Äî no passwords or KYC needed.

2.title: Autonomy:
2.description: You control your gameplay; you can disconnect anytime.

3.title: Education:
3.description: We promote awareness and help players understand risks.

4.title: Community Support:
4.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to guide you toward healthy gaming habits.

playSmart.title: üéÆ Remember ‚Äî Play Smart
playSmart.intro: Gambling should always be fun, social, and balanced.|Keep these key reminders in mind:

reminders.0: Set a time limit before you start.
reminders.1: Never chase losses or play under emotional stress.
reminders.2: Treat winnings as a bonus, not income.
reminders.3: Keep gambling separate from your work and relationships.
reminders.4: Stop playing when the fun stops.

finalMessage.paragraph1: At {siteName}.games, your well-being is our top priority.|We encourage every player to make conscious, informed choices and enjoy a safe gaming experience.
finalMessage.paragraph2: If you need advice, assistance, or self-exclusion support, contact us at

faqs.title: FAQs ‚Äì {siteName}
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common {siteName} questions. Learn about wallet login, deposits, withdrawals, fair play, and blockchain transparency.
faqs.intro: Welcome to the {siteName} FAQ Center, where you'll find quick answers to the most common questions about our crypto gaming platform.|If you can't find your answer here, our 24/7 support team is always ready to help at {siteName}.games.

blockchainTransparency.title: üß© Blockchain Transparency
blockchainTransparency.paragraph1: {siteName}.games is powered by Ethereum-based smart contracts, ensuring that every bet, transaction, and reward is recorded transparently on-chain.|All data and game logic are immutable and verifiable, ensuring true fairness and auditability.
blockchainTransparency.paragraph2: You can track all platform transactions through public explorers such as:
blockchainTransparency.guarantee: This guarantees that no manipulation or bias can occur ‚Äî ever.

0.question: 1. Can I register on your website?
0.answer: Yes ‚Äî registration is open to anyone 18 years or older (or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction).|You must also ensure that online gaming is legal where you reside.|At {siteName}.games, you don't need traditional sign-ups or passwords.|Simply connect your wallet via Dynamic.xyz to start playing instantly.|üëâ For legal and compliance details, please review our Terms & Conditions.
0.reminder: Reminder: Gambling can be addictive. Please play responsibly and know your limits.

1.question: 2. What if I forget my login details?
1.answer: Since {siteName} uses wallet-based login via Dynamic.xyz, you don't use traditional passwords.|To access your account again:|Reconnect your wallet using the same address you originally used.|If you've lost access to your wallet, please restore it with your seed phrase or backup method (we never store or control private keys).|{siteName} cannot reset or recover your wallet credentials for security reasons.

2.question: 3. Can I change my username or linked wallet?
2.answer: Your {siteName} account is tied to your wallet address.|To use a new wallet, simply connect a new one ‚Äî but note that your previous gaming history, VIP status, and bonuses will not transfer automatically.

3.question: 4. How do I become a VIP member?
3.answer: Our VIP program is exclusive and invitation-only.|As you play and engage with the {siteName} community, your gaming activity is automatically tracked.|Once eligible, you'll receive an official invitation via in-platform notification or direct message from the {siteName} team.|VIPs enjoy access to exclusive bonuses, faster withdrawals, and personalized rewards.

0.question: 5. How do I deposit crypto?
0.answer: Depositing on {siteName} is fast and simple:|Go to "My Wallet" on the main dashboard.|Choose Deposit and select your preferred cryptocurrency (e.g., BTC, ETH, USDT, BNB).|Copy your unique wallet address or scan the QR code.|Send your crypto from your external wallet to the address displayed.|Once confirmed on the blockchain, your funds will appear in your {siteName} balance automatically.|‚ö†Ô∏è Make sure you only send supported cryptocurrencies to the correct address network (e.g., ERC20, TRC20, BEP20).

1.question: 6. How long do deposits take?
1.answer: Deposits are usually confirmed within 5‚Äì10 minutes, depending on blockchain congestion and transaction fees.|You can track the progress of your transaction through a block explorer (e.g., Etherscan.io or BscScan.com) using your transaction hash (TXID).|A minimum of 3 confirmations is typically required for your deposit to appear in your balance.

2.question: 7. What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
2.answer: The minimum withdrawal amount depends on the cryptocurrency you are using.|Each coin has its own network fee and minimum threshold.|These values are displayed in the Withdraw section under "My Wallet."

3.question: 8. How do I withdraw my winnings?
3.answer: To withdraw your crypto:|Go to "My Wallet" ‚Üí "Withdraw."|Enter your destination wallet address and the amount you wish to withdraw.|Double-check your address and network type before confirming.|Withdrawals are processed instantly, but may take a few minutes depending on blockchain network activity.|üí° Always ensure your receiving wallet supports the network you're withdrawing from.

4.question: 9. What if my transaction is delayed?
4.answer: Blockchain transactions sometimes take longer due to network congestion or low gas fees.|If your deposit or withdrawal hasn't arrived:|Check your TXID on the blockchain explorer.|Confirm that you used the correct network and address.|If it's been more than an hour, contact {siteName}.games with your TXID and wallet details.

0.question: 10. Are {siteName} games fair?
0.answer: Yes ‚Äî all {siteName} games are built using provably fair technology and verified smart contracts.|Every bet, result, and payout can be independently verified on the blockchain.|We operate on transparent, tamper-proof systems that guarantee randomness, fairness, and openness.|You can view game outcomes and transaction proofs on-chain through Etherscan or the respective network explorer.

1.question: 11. What should I do if a game freezes or crashes?
1.answer: If your game stops responding:|Refresh the page.|Clear your browser cache and reconnect your wallet.|If the issue persists, contact our support team via Live Chat or {siteName}.games.|Our team will assist you in restoring your game session or balance if affected.

2.question: 12. Can I use more than one wallet or account?
2.answer: No.|Each player is permitted to use one wallet address as their primary account.|Creating multiple accounts or using wallet rotations to claim bonuses or exploit promotions is strictly prohibited and may result in account restriction or balance forfeiture.

3.question: 13. Is my personal data safe?
3.answer: Yes.|At {siteName}.games, we do not collect personal data ‚Äî your identity remains secure.|Access is managed through Dynamic.xyz, ensuring full privacy and ownership of your digital identity.|No passwords, emails, or sensitive documents are stored by us.|Your wallet = your identity.

0.question: 14. Does {siteName} support responsible gambling?
0.answer: Absolutely.|We encourage every player to enjoy gaming in moderation.|You can request a self-exclusion period or take a cooling-off break anytime by contacting {siteName}.games.|If you feel gambling is affecting your life, visit our Responsible Gambling page for resources and help organizations.

1.question: 15. What should I do if I suspect a gambling problem?
1.answer: If you feel your gambling is getting out of control, take a break and reach out to one of these trusted organizations for confidential help:|GamCare: GamCare - Founder of the National Gambling Helpline|Gambling Therapy: Gambling Therapy - Advice and support for problem gambling|Gamblers Anonymous: GA G√§vle - Monday|Our support team can also guide you on limiting access to your account safely.

needMoreHelp.title: üí¨ Need More Help?
needMoreHelp.intro: Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you via:
needMoreHelp.liveChat: üí¨ Live Chat (available inside your wallet-connected dashboard)
